"Hello! My name is monchi. It's a pleasu: "I like to have a variety of outfits to go walking in. From the look of you, I would say you're particular about your fashion too, aren't you?"
"Recently, I've been thinking of replacing the buttons on my coat with cuter ones, so I've been looking for replacements..."
"When I learned about a mysterious variety of button-shaped nut, I was intrigued. These nuts sound like they would look very cute on me."
"I have heard that Fang Banshees like to gather them. Um, if it isn't too much trouble for you, would you care to find some for me?"
